column3:
This game is great, I rated it at one because there are so many ads, (one 
every 10-15 seconds), and everytime one come on it rewinds 2-3 steps of 
gameplay. There is no way to enjoy this game unless you dish out 3.49..

These good reviews obviously never played the actual 2048. This app has way 
too many ads. It's ridiculous. It also doesn't have built in features to 
let you continue or reset. It just stops when there's no moved left. Why 
doesn't it confirm your score and then reset automatically? For having low ...Full ReviewThese good reviews obviously never played the actual 2048. This app has way 
too many ads. It's ridiculous. It also doesn't have built in features to 
let you continue or reset. It just stops when there's no moved left. Why 
doesn't it confirm your score and then reset automatically? For having low 
features, it has too many ads.
